column8:
$ use
check(NOT !p door>locked)
check(! door>doorID, match, doorID)
disable(! door>locked)
write(the door is now unlocked)
%
check(!p door>locked)
check(! door>doorID, match, doorID)
enable(! door>locked)
write(the door is now locked)

burning

value:0>10

description:about to go out / fleeting flame / burning / burning bright

OnValue:0
disable(burning)
set(lit, 0)
disable(source of light)
column9:
$ turn on / light
destroy(match)
enable(burning)
set(burning, 10)
set(lit, 1)
column11:
source of light

description: lights the area
